DOC.brief_summary: Assess impact chronic use aspartame glycemia , appetite body composition .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Aspartame Appetite , Body Composition Oral Glucose Tolerance
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly assign one three parallel arm : 0 % ( water ) , 5 mg , 15mg aspartame . Participants oral glucose tolerance test begin end 12 week intervention . . Participants report lab weekly 12 week pick next week 's intervention product measurement body weight , waist circumference , blood pressure heart rate . They consume intervention product daily 12 week . They record appetite sensation collect 24 hour urine sample week 0 , 4 , 8 , 12 .
DOC.criteria: BMI 1825 , fast blood sugar 72 108 mg/dl via capillary fingerstick .
